title: Zelda: Breath of the Wild V 1.3.0 & Master Trials DLC
description:
This pack includes:
Breath of the Wild 1.3.0 update with DLC 1 with the Master Trials
Cemu 1.8.1b
Cemuhook 4.2.0 which allows all videos to play
Shader Caches
Graphics Packs
Controller config for xbox 360 controller or xinput device 

To play run Cemu.exe
Select Graphics packs you want to run, don't use conflicting ones
Load Game Located The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild [ALZP01]/Code/U-King.rpx
Once data is loaded enable gpu fence skip (hack) 

First Load takes time and cpu resources as it compiles the shader cache the default one takes 10 gb of ram on nvidia cards, if you only have 8 gb of ram change to the smaller shader cache located in Shader cache/transferable the one that says (2) rename first delete the (2).

To name horse use Pro Controller config .ccc file press start on controller the enter on the keyboard then it should allow you to enter a name.

To use motion controlls on some puzzles you need to use the Wii U pad config. The mouse controls the movement hold down right click
